en.title: **Information Technology Security Specialist**
en.info: OculusIT (Outsourced to University of Dallas), Irving, TX
en.text:
• Maintain high-performance endpoint protection using Azure AD, Intune, and Sophos tools.
• Provide technical support for faculty and staff, ensuring quick resolution of service requests and hardware/software issues.
• Monitor and apply system security updates using SCCM, contributing to a 40% patch compliance increase.
• Manage PKI infrastructure and enforce MFA policies to reduce security incidents.
• Collaborate with OculusIT leadership and UD stakeholders to align support operations with security best practices (NIST, ISO 27001).

en.title: **IT Support Engineer**
en.text:
• Managed IT systems and optimized uptime using SolarWinds and Route53.
• Deployed SCCM for automated patch management, ensuring system compliance.
• Migrated outdated PKI systems to Entrust PKI, reducing security vulnerabilities.
• Implemented NIST-aligned security measures, improving network safety.
• Enhanced user authentication protocols with Azure Entra-ID IAM and MFA.
• Created SQL queries for compliance reports and certificate lifecycle analysis.
• Configured and managed switches/routers for student dorm networks.

en.title: **Vulnerability Management Analyst**
en.text:
• Performed weekly vulnerability assessments with Nessus and Qualys across cloud, on‑prem, and hybrid environments to maintain full visibility of security weaknesses.
• Triaged and prioritized findings using CVSS, exploitability, and business impact to accelerate remediation of high‑risk issues.
• Collaborated with IT, DevOps, and Cloud teams to coordinate patching, hardening, and configuration updates with minimal operational disruption.
• Built clear vulnerability reports and dashboards (Splunk/Excel) for leadership to track risk posture and remediation SLAs.
• Maintained an up‑to‑date asset inventory to ensure complete scan coverage and accurate compliance reporting.
• Tracked emerging zero‑days and integrated threat intelligence into risk assessments to guide urgent remediation.
• Aligned program activities with NIST CSF, CIS Benchmarks, and ISO 27001 to support audits and regulatory initiatives.

en.title: **Cybersecurity Analyst**
en.text:
• Monitored and analyzed SIEM events using Splunk and QRadar, improving response efficiency.
• Conducted vulnerability assessments with Tenable and Nessus, addressing critical risks.
• Developed Python scripts for log parsing, reducing manual analysis time.
• Created incident response playbooks based on MITRE ATT&CK, standardizing SOC operations.
• Improved intrusion detection accuracy by optimizing SIEM rule sets.
